title: There's Always a Rainbow: It's the Thought that Matters
description: Thereâ€™s Always a Rainbow will leave you educated and empowered. Detailed are the seven universal laws, your conscious and subconscious mind, and how they work in unison to manifest your thoughts into reality, whether you want them to or not. Close the door on your past habitual thinking that has gotten you this far, and open the door to infinite possibilities of a harmonious life. Once you understand your ownership of the circumstances in your life, you have the empowerment of knowing your future is in your control.
author: Michele Scholz-Evers
